column5: Cottage is located on the banks of Cow Bayou. On site boat dock can accommodate a canoe, kayak or a 20+ foot fishing boat. Water is brackish and supports a variety of both fresh and salt water fish. Sleep area accommodates two Adults with a double bed and bathroom with shower. Full kitchen, including microwave, stove, and dishwasher. Secured WIFI and high speed internet are available with supplied password.
